name: KK Steel Products
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “K. K. Steel Products”, are one of the leading organizations that are engaged in manufacturing, wholesaling and trading a wide range of high grade Kitchen Drawer Basket, Modular S.S. Kitchen, Kitchen Pullout, Kitchen Corner, Kitchen Tray, Kitchen Trolley, Kitchen Stand, Grill, Valuable Accessories, Steel & Wooden Furniture and S.S. Railing.

Our Team: Manufacturing professionals Quality controllers Packaging & storing personnel Logistic personnel

Our Quality: We have succeed in gaining a huge client-base for ourselves by offering a high quality range of products at our clients end. Quality being the main pillar of our organization, we are manufacturing range in adherence with the industry set quality parameters. To ensure that all the products are as par the international quality norms, we have developed a quality controlling unit which is well equipped with various latest quality testing machines.

Infrastructural Facilities: We have established a sophisticated infrastructure facility, which sprawls over a vast area of land and is an integral part of our organization. Our facility is efficiently installed with various latest technology and modern equipment, which supports us in manufacturing a flawless range of products within the stipulated time frame.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we aim at attaining the trusts of maximum client by offering them the best quality products. Our clients can avail this range in variegated customized products which are developed as par the international quality parameters. Moreover, our fair and transparent business polices, ethical business polices, client-centric approaches, time-execution of all the undertaken consignments, we have achieve a reputable position in the market.

Why Us?: Exemplary range of quality products Modern infrastructure Efficacious team of employees Work ethics and policies
